entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 6:20 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. A few showers near the British Columbia border late in the afternoon. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:20 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few showers near the British Columbia border. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 6:20 PM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
